basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Python Engineer
basics.summary: Skilled Python Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, experienced in backend development using Python for AI/ML applications, data processing, and scalable web solutions. Proficient in developing robust backend code, integrating APIs, and utilizing version control and CI/CD pipelines for efficient deployment.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Engineered backend systems and AI-powered solutions using Python, integrating with APIs and databases to support data-driven applications.
highlights: Engineered and deployed AI-powered solutions including RoboGPT using Python, LLMs, and OpenAI APIs for data transformation and natural language processing in robot control
Developed backend integration layers for AI applications, ensuring efficient data retrieval and processing with MongoDB
Collaborated on code reviews and implemented version control using Git to maintain clean, maintainable codebases
Utilized CI/CD pipelines for deploying scalable backend services and performed debugging and unit testing for reliability

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Contributed to backend development for a full-stack retargeting platform, focusing on API integration and data serving.
highlights: Developed backend code to serve datasets through APIs, ensuring performant and scalable data flow using Node.js and TypeScript
Collaborated with teams to integrate server-side logic with frontend elements, optimizing for reliability and database integration
Applied version control with Git and Docker for managing code and containerizing services

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Developed automation scripts to enhance efficiency in data processing tasks.
highlights: Implemented JavaScript-based automation tools for data transformation and form handling, improving team productivity through scripting

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing innovative automation solutions.
highlights: Developed Otis, a JavaScript-based templating tool for automating form-filling and email generation, enhancing data processing efficiency
Demonstrated problem-solving skills in debugging and testing automation scripts

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based automation tool that streamlined data transformation and generation processes

projects.name: defender-bot
projects.description: Developed a Python-controlled LEGO Mindstorms robot using MicroPython, demonstrating backend programming, data processing from sensors, and OOP principles for robotics applications.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Engineered an Nvidia Isaac Sim extension using Python and LLMs for natural language processing and API integration to control robots via OpenAI commands, involving data transformation pipelines.

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: Built an AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection using TensorFlow.js, handling data processing and backend logic integration.
